description:
A great pack for mountain biking, hiking or cross-country skiing. It comes with a MEC reservoir that lets you leave the tube in the pack during refills, and the hydration sleeve keeps your water in place while you bounce down trails.

  • Made of bluesign® recycled nylon fabric with a PU coating for great water resistance
  • 2L MEC reservoir included with Plug-n-Play that lets you quickly disconnect the hose
  • Hydration sleeve, hook-and-loop hanger, hose port, and shoulder strap loops
  • Ridged foam back panel with mesh overlay for comfort and wicking
  • Sternum strap and removable webbing waist belt keep your pack secure for all activities
  • 1 large compartment and two zippered accessory pockets with key clip
  • Two internal mesh pockets hold tools or other gear
  • Front pocket is bellowed with stretch mesh to allow for quick storage of a jacket or pads
  • Compression straps also allow you to easily attach a helmet
name: MEC Mountain Fountain 14 Hydration Pack - Unisex
